title: Pasta with Spicy Prawns and Ginger

ingredients.content: 20 - 30 g fresh ginger, peeled, cut in slices (2 mm)

preparations.content: Place coriander in mixing bowl and chop <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.

Place garlic and ginger in mixing bowl then chop <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula and chop again <b>3 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer half the mixture to the bowl with chopped coriander, and set aside.
Add butter and milk to mixing bowl then heat <b>2 min/80°C/speed 1<b>.
Add cayenne, tomatoes, cumin and lemon juice. Blend <b>30 sec/speed 8<b>.
Add pasta and water then cook <b>12 min/100°C//speed 0.5<b>.
Add prawns and reserved minced ginger/garlic/coriander mixture then cook <b>4 min/100°C//speed <b>. Serve immediately in pasta bowls.
